title: Safelane
description: A mobile app designed to tackle neglected issue of potholes, open manholes, and other road hazards that can lead to accidents.

title: Pollex
description: A social platform where users or organizations can create polls, and get responses. Also people can share their opinion by polling.

title: InforMMU
description: An application that helps both faculty and students to streamline their academic experience in MM(DU).
